Verses: 1 raakkaalangalil En Padukkaiyile En Aaththuma Nesaraith Thedinen; Thediyum Naan Avaraik Kaanavillai.
2 naan Ezhundhu Nagaraththin Veedhigalilum Therukkalilum Thirindhu, En Aaththuma Nesaraith Theduven Endren; Thediyum Naan Avaraik Kaanavillai.
3 nagaraththile Thirigira Kaavalaalar Ennaik Kandaargal: En Aaththumanesaraik Kandeergalaa Endru Avargalaik Ketten.
4 naan Avargalai Vittuk Konjadhooram Kadandhuponavudane, En Aaththuma Nesaraik Kanden; Avarai Naan En Thaayin Veettilum Ennaip Petravalin Araiyilum Konduvandhu Vidumattum Vidaamal Patrikkonden.
5 erusalemin Kumaaraththigale! Enakkup Piriyamaanavalukku Manadhaagumattum Neengal Avalai Vizhikkappannaamalum Ezhuppaamalumirukkumpadi Velimaangalmelum Veliyin Maraigalmelum Ungalai Aanaiyidugiren.
6 vellaippolaththinaalum Saambiraaniyinaalum Varththagarudaiya Sagalavidha Kandhappodiyinaalum Undaagiya Vaasanaiyai Veesi, Thoobasthambangalaippol Vanaandharaththilirundhu Varugira Ivar Yaar?
7 idho, Saalomonudaiya Manjam; Isravelin Savuriyavaangalil Arubadhu Savuriyavaangal Adhai Sutri Nirkiraargal.
8 ivargalellaarum Pattayam Pidiththu, Yuththaththukkup Pazhaginavargalaayirukkiraargal; Raakkaala Bayaththinimiththam Avanavanudaiya Pattayam Avanavan Araiyilirukkiradhu.
9 saalomon Raajaa Thanakku Leebanonin Maraththinaal Oru Radhaththaip Pannuviththaar.

10 adhin Thoongalai Velliyinaalum, Adhin Thattaip Ponninaalum, Adhin Aasanaththai Raththaambaraththinaalum Pannuviththaar; Adhin Utpuraththile Erusalemin Kumaaraththigalinimiththam Nesam Ennum Samukkaalam Viriththirundhadhu.
11 seeyon Kumaaraththigale! Neengal Purappattuppoi, Raajaavaagiya Saalomonin Kaliyaana Naalilum, Manamagizhchchiyin Naalilum, Avarudaiya Thaayaar Avarukku Soottina Mudiyodirukkira Avaraip Paarungal.
